accreditation.subtitle: Our institution is recognized by various national and international accrediting bodies
accreditation.title: Accreditation
accreditation.whatIsText: Accreditation ensures that our courses meet rigorous standards of quality and are recognized by employers and educational institutions. When you complete a course with us, you can be confident that your qualification will be respected and valued in the industry.
accreditation.whyChooseText: Studying at an accredited institution like Susca Watts Academy gives you the assurance that your education meets established standards and that your qualification will be recognized by employers. Our accreditations with various national and international bodies allow us to offer certifications and qualifications that enhance your career prospects.

consulting.appointmentText: Fill out the form below to schedule a consultation with our experts who can guide you through the process of starting your own training center.
consulting.faq: General Questions Our Clients Ask Us

accreditationCost.answer1: It all depends on what you have in place, the more you have in place the better. In other words, the more you do, the cheaper it is.
accreditationCost.answer2: If you do this by yourself, it could also cost you your time (could take months/years, depending on what you have/don't have & how many mistakes you make).
accreditationCost.answer3: Before asking for assistance you must know what qualifications you want to offer. Always keep in mind, To be an accredited provider is expensive - quality learning, high standards, and subject matter experts, assessors and moderators have never been cheap.
accreditationCost.question: How expensive is Accreditation?

accreditationTime.answer: Once we submit your application and supporting documents it can take anything from 3 months to 2 years. The timeline depends on whether your application and supporting documents meet the requirements, and WHERE you submit your application to.
accreditationTime.question: How long does it take to obtain Accreditation?

consulting.intro: If You Want to Start Your Own Training Center
consulting.introText: Susca Watts Academy has 30 years of extensive experience in the training and education industry with courses accredited from 1996 till today, from local accreditations like Services Seta to international accreditations like Cidesco.

finance.importantNote: NB: No student will be allowed to register unless written proof from the financial/relevant institution that the study loan has been approved is presented before the day of registration.
finance.notice: For information regarding the costs of any specific course, please refer to the course details found under "Courses".
finance.option1Text: Pay the full annual tuition fee and other fees with registration required.
finance.option2Text: Fees will be calculated with a 10% administration fee and a fee for your invoice. Down payments can be discussed during your interview and a surety form will have to accompany your registration form - signed by a credit worthy working person.
finance.option3: Option 3: Student Loan - Study Now, Pay Later
finance.option3Text: Private financing allows education to become affordable to anyone. Money shouldn't be what's holding you back from making your dreams come true.
finance.option4Text: Apply for a bank study loan in your private name with the following banks:

freelance.applyText: Fill out the form below to apply for our freelance marketing opportunity. Our team will review your application and contact you within 7 days.
freelance.benefits: Benefits of Being a Freelance Marketer
freelance.introText: Work your own hours and decide your own income. As a freelancer for Susca Watts Academy, you are your own boss. We will give you the opportunity to market our courses that have been helping people for years already, and in exchange, you will receive your share for every student you send our way that signs up.

history.description: In 1994, SUSCA WATTS ACADEMY opened its doors as a national training institute with 7 learners. The company literally doubled its amount of learners every year and within 3 years we became Internationally accredited.

timeline.1994: SUSCA WATTS ACADEMY opened its doors as a national training institute with 7 learners.
timeline.1996: We became established in the industry with growing enrollment.
timeline.2000: Mrs. Susca Le Roux received the Award for South Africa 2000 extraordinary women in business as published by Nedbank.

history.title: Our History

mission.description: At Susca Watts Academy, we strive to accommodate students according to their needs and go the extra mile to assist. We have been in the industry since 1996, and it is our passion to create meaningful futures for our students. We motivate our students to always strive for success!
mission.title: Our Mission

info.subtitle: Learn more about who we are and what we do
info.title: About Susca Watts Academy

item1.description: We put our students' needs first, providing personalized support and guidance.
item1.title: Student-Centered

item2.description: We maintain world-class standards in our teaching methods and course offerings.
item2.title: Excellence

item3.description: We focus on providing skills that lead to meaningful employment and entrepreneurial opportunities.
item3.title: Empowerment

info.welcome: Welcome to Susca Watts Academy, a premier training institution with its head office and main campus located in the heart of Middelburg, Mpumalanga, South Africa. We pride ourselves on offering a diverse range of courses designed to equip students with the skills and knowledge needed for successful careers across various industries.

whyStudy.conclusion: By choosing Susca Watts Academy, you're not just enrolling in a course—you're joining a community dedicated to your success and personal growth. Join us and take the first step toward a brighter future.

reasons.access: Nationwide Access: Our Online Business courses enable you to study from anywhere in South Africa, ensuring that quality education is accessible to all.
reasons.accreditation: Accredited Excellence: At Susca Watts Academy, we uphold world-class standards in our training methods. Our accreditation with respected regulatory bodies such as QCTO, SERVICES SETA, ETDP SETA, SAAHSP, and ITEC guarantees that you're receiving top-quality education.
reasons.courses: Diverse Course Options: We offer a variety of accredited courses that can be pursued on-site or through distance learning. Our student advisers are here to help you select the courses that will shape the future you desire.
reasons.enrollment: Flexible Enrollment: We believe in providing opportunities for everyone to pursue their dreams, regardless of their previous qualifications.
reasons.environment: Motivational Environment: We motivate our students to strive for success and reach their full potential. Our supportive learning environment fosters growth and achievement.
reasons.experience: Industry Experience: Since 1994, our passion has been creating meaningful futures for our students. Our extensive industry experience ensures that you receive relevant and practical training.
reasons.fees: All-Inclusive Fees: Our course fees cover all your study materials, so there are no hidden costs. We also offer flexible payment options to make education more affordable.
reasons.support: Personalized Support: We go the extra mile to accommodate students according to their needs. Our dedicated staff is committed to helping you achieve your goals and succeed in your studies.
reasons.workStudy: Work and Study Balance: We offer flexible schedules that allow you to work and earn an income while studying. Depending on the course, you may only need to attend class one day a week.

whyStudy.title: Why Study With Us?

rpl.aim: What is the Aim of RPL?
rpl.benefits: Benefits of RPL to Candidates and Companies
rpl.subtitle: Get formal recognition for your skills and experience
rpl.title: Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL)
rpl.whatIsText: The Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) is a process which allows a person who has formal, non-formal and informal learning to be measured, mediated for recognition across different contexts and certified against the requirements for credit, access, inclusion or advancement in the formal education and training system or workplace.
